info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Santa Rosa and central Escambia Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 258 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Gonzalez, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ferry Pass, Brent, Ensley, Gonzalez, Pace, Goulding, Pea Ridge and Floridatown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
